projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: FIS Cleared Derivatives (Fintech)
projects.bodyText: Core DevOps Member managing CI/CD, Security, Build, Orchestration & Release for 17+ core micro services (Java/Groovy/Python). Delivered over 20+ individual releases to clients like HSBC, Bank Of America, JP Morgan.

projects.title: Checkmarx Migration
projects.bodyText: Lead 17+ component migration over Checkmarx (Nextgen SAST Tool) from Veracode. Used Jenkins, RestAPIS, Git, Maven, Gradle.

projects.title: Harness CD Migration
projects.bodyText: Migrated Jenkins CI pipelines to Github Actions. Migrated Repos from Bitbucket to Github. Enabled Sandbox, Performance, Demo team for automated deployments using Harness.
